>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the collection of available next-step types (e.g., "Verify Asset", "Requestor Acknowledgment") defined for the site. These types categorize and drive ticket workflow recommendations, helping agents understand what actions to take next.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get types: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) to list all configured types
2. Select type: Choose appropriate `TicketNextStepTypeId` based on needed action
3. Create next step: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-next-step) with the type ID
4. Monitor: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) to view ticket recommendations

**Response Fields**: Each type includes `TicketNextStepTypeId`, `Name`, `Description`, `IsActive`, and configuration settings.

**Use Cases**: Building next-step creation dialogs, filtering available actions by type, understanding workflow options for ticket resolution.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types/\{ticketNextStepTypeId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-step-type) – Get specific type details
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-next-step) – Create next step
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) – List ticket next steps

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Next-step types retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Metadata describing a next-step type that can be attached to tickets.","properties":{"TicketNextStepTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the next-step type.","example":"22222222-2222-4222-8222-222222222222"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the next-step type.","example":"Requestor acknowledgment"},"Icon":{"type":"string","description":"Optional icon key used by the UI.","nullable":true,"example":"check"},"CanBeForceResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the next step can be force resolved.","example":true},"CanBeUserResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the next step can be resolved by a non-agent user.","example":false},"RequiredToCloseTicket":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this next-step type is required before closing tickets.","example":false}},"required":["TicketNextStepTypeId","Name","CanBeForceResolved","CanBeUserResolved","RequiredToCloseTicket"],"title":"TicketNextStepType"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
